lenders.name: ECON 201
lenders.loan_because: Jacksonville University economics students are dedicated to helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Economic growth is achieved by increasing productivity through investment in capital.  This can be physical capital, human capital or technology.  Physical capital is anything man-made that makes workers more productive, such as vehicles and machinery.  Most micro loans help people to obtain physical capital.  Human capital is education.  Some micro loans help workers become more productive by furthering their education.  Technology is the knowledge of methods of production.  Research & development is a common means of discovering and developing new technologies.  Micro loans help the world to achieve more economic growth, which in turn improves the standard of living and reduces global poverty.

lenders.name: StarSon
lenders.loan_because:
We are all brothers and sisters on this planet and we need not just to care for each other, but to also take compassionate action to make a meaningful difference.

Micro Credit is simple but very powerful. It breaks big problems down into small pieces and connects people together, even from the other side of the world. It makes it easy to care and easy to demonstrate that care in a practical way.

Every effort we make towards peace and love takes the world one step closer to paradise and a little further away from the nightmare our foolish leaders seem to wish for. Do what you can. Do it with love and do it NOW!!! The people have the power - let us use it wisely.
lenders.occupational_info: People generally come to counselling seeking either change or understanding. They open themselves wide. Sometimes there is much pain and tears, hope and fear and doubt. Eventually people understand that life is deep and mysterious and that being fully alive means being fully connected to the deepest and wisest parts of ones being, even when it hurts or is difficult. We cannot live just on the surface, we must go deep and learn to trust the process of our own unfolding. We are mind, body, emotions, spirit, soul and so much more. Nothing can be left out or ignored. Holistic simply means WHOLE. Skillful, soulful counselling helps people to become reconnected to wholeness, instead of being divided against ones self.

lenders.name: eduardo
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help my mother to recover & restore back the old days of her store. My mom's store still support the families of my brothers & sisters who don't have source of income. I'm the youngest of 11children & since I was the only child who finish college & stood-up as the elder/mature of all; I don't want to see my 75yr old monther everyday worrying where she will get money to pay their bills. 

As I remember when I was still a single I handle her business having gross sales of $28-$30/day (P1K to 1,500/day) I was able to improved it to having a sale of $1,000/day 8yrs ago. 

I left my mom because I got married that time with her store & live at Baguio City [6hrs drive] then the old store that supported me in my college education slowly begun decrease its sales. 

Now, that I decided to go back to place where I born and brought my wife & 3kids with me [but I stayed separately renting a house], I don't want to see my mom worrying everyday and wanting her see the business that she love so much go back to its old days but not letting her loan from someone whos giving so much high interest [20%/month] which I think not fair.

I hope there is someone that can lend us atleast $1,000 to $1,500 payable in 1yr.

I would like people to see that anybody with physical disabilities are capable of having a productive life, as well as living a life out in the community just like anybody else.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a self-taught multimedia designer focusing mainly on website design.  I was born with a disease called "Spinal Muscular Atrophy Type I," and I have grown up in a nursing facility.   However, I didn't let this stop me from learning what I wanted, and even starting up my own business at one time until money problems came along.  Some friends and I had a web design business for about two years, until I decided that I wanted to do something different.  We would not making much money, and it was a big headache for all of us.  So I decided I wanted to do something more helpful and less stressful... advocating for the physically disabled community seemed like my calling.  I have advocated in different places across Florida, trying to help people with physical disabilities have more opportunities in life.

There is much to say about this, and it will all be posted on my website when I'm finished.  But my main goal is to help people with physical disabilities get what they need out of life, and enjoy life to its fullest.  As it is right now, America does practically nothing to help people with physical disabilities.  Many people don't know this, but I have lived through it my whole life, and I know it all too well.
